H0.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. Bertrand Russell

H1.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. A.J.P. Taylor

H2.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. E.P. Thompson

H3.text: Who co-founded CND with Canon Collins. Russellian

A4.text: CND began in November 1957 when a committee was formed, including Canon John Collins as chairman, Bertrand Russell as president and Peggy Duff as organising secretary.

A5.text: Other prominent founding members of CND were Fenner Brockway, E. P. Thompson, A. J. P. Taylor, Anthony Greenwood, Jill Greenwood, Lord Simon, D. H. Pennington, Eric Baker and Dora Russell.
